content.text:
# Draft:List of awards and nominations received by Uttam Kumar

----
Police recovers an unconscious man next to a skeleton found after digging up the soil. In spite of identifying the man as Prabir Majumder after questioning the locals, the man introduced himself as Santanu Roy, a writer by profession, after he regained sense. When the police suspect his true identity as general public has mistaken him for Prabir, he begins to recount past events.
